```{r}
library(forecast)
library(zoo)
library(xts)

IEO<-read.csv("~/Desktop/Brandeis/Class/Third Semester/Forcasting/Data/IEO.csv")
IEO.ts <- xts(IEO$Adj.Close, as.Date(IEO$Date))
ret <- diff(log(IEO.ts))
plot(IEO.ts)
plot(ret^2)

train.ts <- window(IEO.ts, end = "2014-08-31")
valid.ts <- window(IEO.ts, start = "2014-09-01")
ntrain <- length(train.ts)
nvalid <- length(valid.ts)
fit <- auto.arima(train.ts,ic="bic")
fcast <- Arima(valid.ts, model = fit)
fcast.fitted <- xts(fcast$fitted, as.Date(IEO$Date[(ntrain+1):(ntrain+nvalid)]))
```
